executeWithInterchainToken(bytes32,strin.details: Execution should revert unless the msg.sender is the InterchainTokenService

params.amount: The amount of tokens that were sent.
params.commandId: The unique message id for the call.
params.sourceAddress: The address that sent the contract call.
params.sourceChain: The name of the source chain.
params.tokenId: The tokenId of the token manager managing the token.

returns._0: bytes32 Hash indicating success of the execution.

executeWithInterchainToken(bytes32,strin.notice: This will be called after the tokens are sent to this contract.

documentation.text:
@title IInterchainTokenExecutable
 @notice Contracts should implement this interface to accept calls from the InterchainTokenService.
